com.esri.mo2.data.odb
Class SharedObjects

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.data.odb.SharedObjects
public class SharedObjects
extends Object

This class supports CacheInputStream and CacheOutputStream. It maintains a collection of shared objects in memory. Conceptually, its a collection of bi-directional associations, with each handle being associated with an object and vice versa. Internally each shared object has a reference count. When an object is referenced 0 times, it is removed.
